about_the_game:
Aim Assault brings good old arcade rail-shooter into the world of virtual reality. Relive the excitement of old-school arcade games now in VR. Try out various gunplay styles - single gun, dual wielding, with or without a crosshair. Race against the clock and try to beat your personal score or compete in the global leaderboards. Fight different types of enemies in intense situations and everchanging rich environments. Dodge barrages of bullets, kill the bad guys and save the world. The game is currently in development and will be released in Early Access next year.

We are excited to give you the opportunity to play the first level of our game for free. Immerse yourself in the action-packed VR rail shooter, full of shooting, dodging bullets, and fighting villains. Free demo planned for release in Febuary 2025.

"VR gave us a rare opportunity to recreate the arcade shooters we all loved as kids in a new way. Because of VR, we have new tools to immerse players even more into a game full of action." - Jakub Kucera (Game Director)

The final game will feature:

  • A campaign that delivers a classic action-packed story.

  • Difficulty options for each level.

  • Several unique boss fights.

  • Levels where players will also fly or shoot from moving vehicles.

  • A variety of guns and/or loadouts, each offering distinct gameplay styles and its own leaderboard.

  • Multiple skins for each weapon.

  • Variety of enemy types with different abilities.

FAQ:

  • Free demo planned for release in Febuary 2025

  • There is no aim assist in the game - only skill-based gameplay.

  • Reload by pointing your gun towards the ground.

  • There's a variety of difficulty/gun loadout setting, each with its own leaderboard.

  • You can make combo shots by hitting enemies at least 5 times in a row without missing.

  • In cases where players on the leaderboard have the same time, they will be ranked by their highest combo achieved in that run.

Discord

We regularly announce new locations, enemy types, bosses, and game mechanics on our Discord. We also host playtests with our fans on a regular basis. Join our community and share your thoughts on the demo with us.

Compete in the Global Leaderboard

Think you have the fastest aim? We’ve set up a global leaderboard to find out who’s the best shooter in the world. Each difficulty setting and gun loadout has its own leaderboard. Collect points in individual leaderboards to be the global number 1. Shere your best score with us on our Discord!

Testers

In some cases, we also test new features and mechanics exclusively with our Discord community. We value your feedback and encourage you to join us.

Welcome to the world of Aim Assault!

name: Aim Assault

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 2060 or equivalent
  • VR Support: Currently only the following headsets + controllers have been tested and are fully supported: Meta Quest (via Quest Link), Oculus Rift CV1. Other headsets such as Vive Focus 3 or Microsoft Mixed Reality headsets might have incorrect button mappings for some of the features. We plan to fully support a wide range of VR devices in the near future.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
